{{Use dmy dates|date=August 2016}} {{Use British English|date=August 2016}} {{Infobox football biography | name = Ben Barclay | image = | image_size = | caption = | fullname = Benjamin Barclay{{cite web |title=EFL: Retained list: 2015/16 |url=http://www.efl.com/documents/professional-retained-report-2015-16549-3151378.pdf |publisher=English Football League |page=11 |format=PDF |accessdate=9 August 2016 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161202052144/http://www.efl.com/documents/professional-retained-report-2015-16549-3151378.pdf |archivedate=2 December 2016 |df=dmy-all }} | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1996|10|7|df=y}}{{cite web | title = Ben Barclay | url = https://www.11v11.com/players/ben-white-253530/ | website= 11v11.com | publisher = AFS Enterprises | accessdate =10 September 2017}} | birth_place = [[Altrincham]], England | height = | position = [[Defender (association football)#Centre-back|Centre-back]] | currentclub = [[Notts County F.C.|Notts County]]
(on loan from [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]]) | clubnumber = 6 | youthyears1 = 2004–2013 | youthclubs1 = [[Manchester City]] | youthyears2 = 2013–2018 | youthclubs2 = [[Brighton & Hove Albion]] | years1 = 2018– | clubs1 = [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]] | caps1 = 0 | goals1 = 0 | years2 = 2019– | clubs2 = → [[Notts County F.C.|Notts County]] (loan) | caps2 = 9 | goals2 = 0 | club-update = 9:03, 3 March 2019 (UTC) }} '''Benjamin Barclay''' (born 7 October 1996) is an English professional [[Association football|footballer]] who plays as a [[Defender (association football)#Centre-back|centre-back]] for [[EFL League Two|League Two]] club [[Notts County F.C.|Notts County]] on loan from [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]]. ==Club Career== ===Brighton & Hove Albion=== Barclay played regularly for [[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. Reserves and Academy|Brighton U23's]] and made a number of appearances for the Sussex club in the [[Premier League 2]] league in the last few seasons. The former [[Manchester City F.C.|Manchester City]] youth player was included in [[Chris Hughton|Chris Hughton's]] 25 man squad for the [[2018-19 Premier League]] season.{{cite web |url=https://www.brightonandhovealbion.com/teams/first-team/defender/ben-barclay/#|title=Ben Barclay - Defender - First Team - Brighton & Hove Albion|publisher=Brighton & Hove Albion|date=|accessdate=}} He made his debut for Brighton on 28 August 2018, in the [[EFL Cup]] at home against [[Southampton F.C.|Southampton]] where he played the full match in a 1-0 loss against their south coast rivals.https://www.theargus.co.uk/sport/16603946 ====Loan to Notts County==== On 4 January 2019, Barclay joined [[Notts County F.C.|Notts County]] on loan until the end of the season.{{cite web |url=https://www.brightonandhovealbion.com/news/2019/january/loan-switch-for-albion-defensive-pair/|title=LOAN SWITCH FOR ALBION DEFENSIVE PAIR|publisher=Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. |date=4 January 2019 |accessdate=4 January 2019}} Barclay made his Notts County debut a day after joining the club in a [[2018-19 EFL League Two|League Two]] fixture away against Essex club [[Colchester United F.C.|Colchester United]] where it eventually finished 3-3 in what also happened to be his first ever league match.{{cite web |url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/46707291|title=Colchester United 3-3 Notts County - BBC Sport|publisher=BBC Sport|date= 5 January 2019 |accessdate=5 January 2019}} ==Career statistics== {{Updated|match played 2 March 2019}} {| class=wikitable style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|[[FA Cup]] !colspan=2|[[EFL Cup|League Cup]] !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=1|[[Brighton & Hove Albion F.C.|Brighton & Hove Albion]] |[[2018–19 Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. season|2018–19]] |[[Premier League]] |0||0||colspan=2|—||1||0||colspan=2|—||1||0 |- !colspan=3|Total !0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0 |- |rowspan=1|[[Notts County F.C.|Notts County]] (loan) |[[2018–19 Notts County F.C. season|2018–19]] |[[League Two]] |9||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||9||0 |- !colspan=3|Career Total !9!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!10!!0 |- |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Notts County F.C. squad}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Barclay, Ben}} [[Category:1996 births]] [[Category:English footballers]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players]] [[Category:Association football defenders]]
